description: Internal alterations to existing single storey detached outbuilding to create annexe/gym; alterations to the fenestration, involving insertion of two windows to front elevation (following removal of existing window); removal of rear patio door and the permanent fixing shut of shutter to rear elevation.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: Site Location Plan, 2015/PRG/101 Proposed Floor Plan, Block Plan and Elevations of Outbuilding, 2015/PRG/101A Existing Floor Plan, Block Plan and Elevations of Outbuilding.
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Development Management DPD (2013), policies D3 & D4 of the Publication London Plan (2020), policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012). | The detached rear outbuilding shall only be used for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the development hereby approved, and shall not be used for habitable accommodation, as an independent dwelling or any industrial, commercial or business use.

REASON: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2016), policies D3 and D4 of the Publication London Plan (2020), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019). | No kitchen facilities shall be installed in the outbuilding at any time.

REASON: To prevent the creation of a separate self-contained residential unit of accommodation in the interests of the living conditions of the existing and future residents of the site and to ensure that the use of the building does not, by reason of any other activity, harm the living conditions in the area, in accordance with policies 1.1,1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012) and Policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2016), Policies D3 & D4 of the Publication London Plan (2020) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).
